Il magazzino: Registrare il Magazzino su Datev Koinos

requirements: Conoscenze di base di contabilità generale
Accesso al software Datev Koinos per esercitazioni pratiche
Familiarità con l'uso del computer e dei software gestionali
courses.description:
Questo corso offre un percorso pratico e dettagliato sull'utilizzo del software di contabilità Datev Koinos, fornendo le competenze necessarie per gestire efficacemente le operazioni contabili quotidiane. Attraverso lezioni pratiche, imparerai a utilizzare le funzionalità principali del software, dalla registrazione delle operazioni alla chiusura e riapertura dell'esercizio contabile. Il corso è strutturato per guidarti passo dopo passo, rendendo l'apprendimento accessibile sia ai principianti che ai professionisti che desiderano approfondire le loro competenze.
Cosa imparerai:
Introduzione e panoramica delle funzionalità di Datev Koinos.
Registrazione delle operazioni contabili di base.
Gestione delle paghe e delle ritenute d'acconto.
Registrazione di ratei e risconti attivi e passivi.
Procedura per la chiusura e riapertura dell'esercizio contabile.
A chi è rivolto questo corso:
Studenti e neofiti che desiderano apprendere l'utilizzo pratico di Datev Koinos.
Professionisti e impiegati nel settore contabile che intendono aggiornare o approfondire le loro competenze.
Titolari di piccole e medie imprese che vogliono gestire autonomamente la contabilità aziendale.
Programma del Corso:


Sezione 1: Introduzione a Datev Koinos
Inizia il tuo percorso con una panoramica completa sul software Datev Koinos. Scoprirai le funzionalità principali che semplificano la gestione contabile quotidiana e approfondirai il modulo contabilità, con una guida pratica alla configurazione e all’utilizzo delle registrazioni contabili di base.
Sezione 2: Presentazione del modulo contabilità di Datev Koinos
Esplora il modulo contabilità di Datev Koinos. Impara a configurarlo e utilizzarlo per gestire le operazioni contabili in modo efficiente.
Sezione 3: I registri e la liquidazione dell’IVA
Questa sezione è dedicata alla gestione della fatturazione e dell’IVA. Imparerai a emettere fatture con Superbill, a creare e gestire registri IVA e a effettuare la liquidazione IVA trimestrale. Approfondirai anche come preparare correttamente le comunicazioni LIPE per rispettare le normative fiscali.
Sezione 4: Le registrazioni contabili di base
Acquisisci competenze fondamentali per una contabilità aziendale accurata. In questa sezione, imparerai a registrare fatture di acquisto e vendita, gestire note di credito e affrontare particolari casistiche come l’IVA parzialmente detraibile, per una contabilità completa e senza errori.
Inoltre questa sezione ti guiderà nella registrazione di corrispettivi di vendita, fatture UE ed extra-UE e autofatture elettroniche. Affronterai anche la gestione del regime di Split Payment e le dichiarazioni OSS per le vendite transfrontaliere.
Sezione 5: I professionisti e la gestione delle ritenute
In questa parte del corso, apprenderai a gestire le note spese degli amministratori, registrare spese aziendali effettuate con carta di credito e contabilizzare fatture emesse da professionisti. Verrà inoltre spiegato come calcolare e versare le ritenute d’acconto, semplificando questo processo amministrativo.
Sezione 6: Le registrazioni del personale in corso d’anno
Questa sezione ti insegnerà a registrare le paghe e i relativi contributi del personale. Imparerai a integrare correttamente i prospetti delle paghe nella tua contabilità, assicurando una gestione del personale chiara e conforme alle normative.
Sezione 7: Le scritture di assestamento in corso d’anno
Approfondisci la gestione di ratei e risconti attivi e passivi e impara a registrare fatture e note di credito da ricevere ed emettere. Questa sezione ti prepara a trattare correttamente i costi e ricavi secondo il principio di competenza.
Sezione 8: Immobilizzazioni e ammortamenti
Gestisci le immobilizzazioni aziendali in modo efficace. Scoprirai come registrare fatture per acquisti di cespiti, contabilizzare la cessione di immobilizzazioni e calcolare automaticamente gli ammortamenti per ottimizzare la gestione contabile degli investimenti a lungo termine.
Sezione 9: Le registrazioni dei mutui
Questa sezione è dedicata alla gestione dei mutui aziendali. Imparerai a registrare il pagamento delle rate, contabilizzando correttamente gli interessi e le quote capitale per mantenere una contabilità precisa e trasparente.
Sezione 10: Il magazzino
Scopri come gestire i movimenti di magazzino con Datev Koinos. Questa sezione ti guiderà nella registrazione delle operazioni di inventario, garantendo che le scorte aziendali siano sempre sotto controllo e integrate nella contabilità.
Sezione 11: Le altre scritture di assestamento di fine anno
Preparati alla chiusura dell’esercizio con le scritture di rettifica e assestamento. Imparerai a registrare svalutazioni crediti, incassi di crediti svalutati, premi INAIL, accantonamenti per TFR, fondi pensione e costi del personale, assicurando un bilancio accurato e completo.
Sezione 12: Chiusura e riapertura dell’esercizio
Concludi il corso padroneggiando la chiusura e riapertura dell’esercizio contabile. Imparerai a eseguire tutte le scritture necessarie per una transizione precisa e ordinata al nuovo anno contabile, garantendo continuità e conformità.
target_audience: Persone interessate a cambiare o migliorare la propria carriera
Professionisti che vogliono ampliare il loro portafoglio di competenze includendo l’uso di Datev Koinos come strumento di lavoro
Impiegati e professionisti del settore amministrativo e contabile

courses.title: Contabilidad básica
courses.bio: Curso de contabilidad básica para estudiantes que ya cuenten con algún conocimiento de contabilidad.
objectives: En este curso los estudiantes podrán aprender diversos aspectos de la contabilidad como ser el registro de movimientos en el libro diario
También podrán ver explicaciones teóricas, ejercicios y resolución relacionados con el tema RATIOS.
Otro bloque incluye la introducción a la contabilidad de costos, comenzando con el punto de equilibrio, continuando con los costos indirectos de fabricación..
En el último bloque del curso hablaremos sobre el flujo de fondos y el cálculo del VAN (Valor Actual Neto) y la TIR (Tasa interna de retorno))
Elaboración de estados contables (Estado de situación patrimonial, estado de resultados, estado de origen y aplicación de fondos y notas a los estados contables
Aprenderemos sobre la clasificación de cuentas según sean de activo, pasivo, patrimonio, ingresos o gastos
Sobre los RATIOS: calcularemos distintos ratios (como por ejemplo el ROA y ROE) e interpretaremos el resultado obtenido

Presentación y bienvenida al curso: Video de presentación y bienvenida al curso
Registro de asientos o movimientos en el: Material teórico sobre registro de asientos
Ejercicio práctico sobre registro de asientos
Clasificación de cuentas: Conceptos de Activo, Pasivo, Patrimonio, Ingresos y Gastos
Estados Contables: Estados financieros con propósito de información general (NIC 1)
Estado de situación Patrimonial y Estado de Resultados
Presentación del EOAF (Estado de origen y aplicación de fondos)
Actividades de operación, inversión y financiamiento
Estado de origen y aplicación de fondos (EOAF)
Análisis de balances: Presentación del análisis vertical y horizontal
Análisis vertical y horizontal de balances - caso práctico
Diferencia de cambio y Moneda extranjera: Pasivos en Moneda extranjera y diferencia de cambio
Activos en Moneda extranjera y diferencia de cambio
Contabilidad Financiera: Las grandes decisiones de las finanzas, la mezcla financiera

requirements: Tener conocimientos básicos de contabilidad
courses.description:
Este es un curso de contabilidad de nivel intermedio. Si bien comenzaremos con temas sencillos como puede ser el registro de asientos contables, se parte de la base de que el estudiante ya tiene conocimientos de contabilidad.
En el mismo el estudiante verá (entre otros temas) como registrar movimientos en el libro diario, como clasificar cuentas según sean de activo, pasivo, patrimonio, ingresos o gastos y como elaborar estados contables básicos (Estado de situación patrimonial, estado de resultados, estado de origen y aplicación de fondos y notas a los estados contables).
Luego veremos los temas relacionados con inversiones: inversiones inmobiliarias e inversiones intangibles.
El siguiente bloque tratará sobre moneda extranjera y diferencia de cambio.
Luego comenzaremos con temas relacionados con ratios y contabilidad financiera. En ratios veremos ejemplos de algunos ejercicios de cálculo de ratios. En contabilidad financiera hablaremos sobre la mezcla financiera: decisiones de inversión y financiamiento.
En el último bloque haremos una introducción al tema de la contabilidad de costos, hablando sobre el punto de equilibrio.
En todos los casos veremos ejercicios prácticos, información teórica y tendrán en muchos de los bloques material descargable para poder ver los ejercicios e intentar hacerlos en sus casas.
Ante cualquier duda siempre pueden escribirme por el chat de Udemy o buscarme en linkedin.
target_audience: Estudiantes de las carreras de administración, contabilidad, gerencia, etc.
Personas que quieran ampliar sus posibilidades laborales o cambiar de trabajo aprovechando el certificado del curso.

courses.title: ACCA Financial Accounting (FA) - Tam Kurs
courses.bio: Bu kurs bütün tələbələr üçün Financial Accounting (FA) tam öyrənməyə və ACCA Financial imtahanına hazırlaşmağa vasitədir
objectives: Necə mühasibat uçotu aparmaq lazım
ACCA F3 Financial Accounting imtahanına tam hazır olmaq

MÜHASİBAT UÇOTUNUN MƏQSƏDİ: Xahiş: kursa RƏY bildirərkən nəzərə alın
Mühasibat uçotunun prinsipləri və əhatə dairəsi
Mühasibat uçotunun istifadəçiləri və onlara nə lazım
\"DOUBLE ENTRY\" VƏ UÇOT SİSTEMLƏRİ: Nominal ledger və ya General Ledger nədir?
Mühasibat uçotunun əsas düsturu - Accounting Equation
"Debit" & "Credit" - Bunu başa düşün, qalanı çox asandır
TRANZAKSİYALARIN YAZILIŞI: İnventar: FIFO - First In First Out

courses.description:
Əgər təhsil bazarına baxsaq, ACCA kurslarının hansı qiymətə olduğunu aşkar görərik. Buna həm yerli bazardakı kurslar, həm də onlayn xarici kurslar aiddir. Mənim fikrimcə, hamı ACCA F3 kursuna asan keçid əldə etməlidir, çünki bu mühasibin yetişməsində ilk addımdır. Lakin, belə imkan demək olar ki, yoxdur. Bunu nəzərə alaraq, belə qərara gəldim ki, özüm bu kursu yaradım və tələbələrin istifadəsinə verim.

ACCA F3 Tam Kursu tələbələrin istəyini nəzərə alaraq Azərbaycan dilində hazırlanıb. ACCA imtahanları İngilis dilində keçirildiyi üçün kurs boyunca terminlərdən hər iki dildə istifadə olunub. Bu tələbələrə həm mövzunu başa düşməyə, həm də imtahana hazırlaşmağa kömək məqsədi güdür. Nəzərinizə onu da çatdırım ki, kurs üçün qeydiyyatdan keçən zaman bu kursa ömürlük üzvlük əldə edirsiniz.
Aydındır ki, ACCA daim inkişaf edir və hər il imtahanın mündəricatında yeniliklər təqdim edir. Bunu nəzərə alıb, mən də vaxtaşırı kursa yeni videolar və materiallar əlavə edəcəm. Belə yenilikər daimi olaraq sizin istifadənizdə olacaq.
Kurs ərzində hansı mövzunu kifayət qədər aydın formada izah etmədiyimi fikirləşsəniz, bunu mənim nəzərimə çatdırmağı sizdən xahiş edirəm. Belə ki, keyfiyyəti daim artırmaqla həm sizə daha yaxşı kurs təqdim etmiş oluram, həm də tələbələrin imtahandan keçid nəticələrini müsbət istiqamətdə inkişaf etdirmiş oluram.
Yeni
: Uzun müddət ödənişsiz təklif elədiyim bu kursu indi ödənişli statusa keçirmək qərarına gəldim. Bu addımı, həqiqi ACCA tələbələrini cəlb etmək, kursun keyfiyyətini artırmaq və davamlı olaraq kursu yeniləmək məqsədilə atdım. Qeyd edim ki, müxtəlif sosial şəbəkələrdə endirim linklərini vaxtaşırı bölüşəcəm. Uğurlar!

courses.title: Genel Muhasebe Uygulamalı Eğitimi
courses.bio: Hesap işleyişi, Yevmiye ve Defteri Kebir Kayıtları, Aylık ve Kesin Mizan, Bilanço ve Gelir tablosu Hazırlama Uygulaması
objectives: Genel Muhasebe Öğrenilmesi
Yevmiye ve Defteri kebir kayıtlarının yapılması
Bilanço ve Gelir tablosu Düzenlenmesi
Mizanların düzenlenmesi

Giriş: Genel Muhasebe Hesap Kavramı Ve İşleyişi
Uygulama Örnekleri: Excel de Genel Muhasebe Uygulama Örneği

requirements: Temel seviyedir.
courses.description:
Genel Muhasebenin temel seviye de öğrenilmesi amaçlanarak kursumuz hazırlanmıştır. Kurs ile öğrenilecek temel başlıklar 1- Açılış bilançosunu düzenlenmesi 2- Yevmiye kayıtlarının yapılması 3- Büyük defter kayıtlarının yapılması 4- Aylık mizanın düzenlenmesi  5- Dönem sonu envanter işlemlerinin yapılması 6- Gelir tablosunun düzenlenmesi  7- Gelir-gider hesaplarının kapatılması  8- Kesin mizanını düzenlenmesi 9- Dönem sonu bilançosunu düzenlenmesi 10- Bilanço hesaplarının kapatılmasını 11- Yeni muhasebe dönemi hesaplarının açılması.
Kursumuzda öncelikle teorik olarak öğrenilmesi gereken ve bilinmesi gereken önemli konular slaytlar ile anlatılmıştır. Ardından uygulamalı olarak Excel ve Luca muhasebe programı üzerinden örnek işletme ile Açılış fişi kaydedilip Açılış bilançosu düzenlenmiştir. Dönem içi yevmiye kayıtları, defteri kebir kayıtları yapılarak aylık mizan düzenlenmiştir. Ayın KDV tahakkuku kaydı sonrası envanter kayıtları yapılarak gelir tablosu hazırlanmıştır. Dönem sonu gelir gider yansıtmaları yapılarak kesin mizan hazırlanmış ve kapanış bilançosu düzenlenerek ilgili dönem kapanış kaydı ile işlemler tamamlanmıştır. Yeni dönem açılış kaydı ile genel muhasebe işlemleri tamamlanmıştır. Sırası ile tüm işleyiş örnek ile gösterilerek daha anlaşılır bir süreç eğitimi hedeflenmiştir. Tüm eğitim seviyelerine hitap etmesi açısından kurs içeriği temel düzeyde ve basit bir dille anlatılmıştır. yapılan işlemleriler ilgili kullanılan monografi, Excel tabloları ve dökümanları kaynaklar kısmına eklenmiştir. Çalışmalarınız da kullanmanız için paylaşılmıştır. Kursu bitirdikten sonra sizler de öğrendiklerinizi pekiştirmek için örnek uygulama yapmanızı öneririz. Kursta öğrendiklerinizin faydalı olmasını ve size yeni kapılar açmasını dileriz. iyi çalışmalar ve başarılar dileriz.
target_audience: Genel muhasebe öğrenmek isteyen herkes

courses.title: 业财融合：全面预算管理与控制
courses.bio: 化解企业预算管理中的十面埋伏
objectives: 提升认知：预算管理不仅仅是领导的事，而是企业员工每个人都需要关注的事情。
防范风险：通过全面预算控制与分析，降低财务风险
掌握管理方法：预算编制的技巧和预算分析的方法等
提供解决方案：全面预算管理系统解决方案课

课程内容: 化解企业预算管理中的十面埋伏
战略预算全面预算管理
战略预算-预算管理体系
战略预算-预算管理制度
预算管理最佳实战案例分析
什么是全面预算管理?
全面预算对企业的价值
全面预算在企业应用中的难点及解决方案
从经营角度如何用好预算工具?
如何建立健全专职的预算管理组织?
如何制定并完成年度经营目标?
化解全面预算管理的认识问题一让领导和各部门重视不夸大、不抵制（一）
化解全面预算管理的认识问题一-让领导和各部门重视不夸大、不抵制（二）
化解全面预算管理的组织问题一财务部门对各部门业务流程把握与协调
化解全面预算编制的技巧问题对上一年的总结，战略数字形式的上传下达 (一)
化解全面预算编制的技巧问题对上一年的总结，战略数字形式的上传下达 (二)
预算编制的方法
企业预算方针目标的论证思路
案例解析: 经营预算政策指引
化解预算控制的问题一精准控制到人，控制到业务层面预算归口管理，责任到部门到人
化解预算调整的问题一-防止过多审批调整，减少不确定因数
化解预算分析的问题-分析源自每个人、每项业务、每个部门，不走马不观花
化解预算考核的问题一阶段性考核与调整，及时跟进与督促
突破预算管理”十面埋伏”，提高企业财务预算管理作用
全面预算管理系统解决方案

requirements: 管理公司财务的人

courses.title: BWA selber erstellen
courses.bio: Betriebswirtschaftliche Auswertung für: Buchhaltung, Bank, Gründungszuschuss, Kredit zur Finanzierung mit Excel ua.
objectives: Wie Sie Monat für Monat Ihre eigene BWA erstellen können.
Wie Sie Ihre BWA lesen und verstehen lernen.
Wie Sie mit Ihrer BWA Ihren Gründungszuschuss selbst verlängern können.
Wie Sie Ihre BWA selber erstellen können.
Woher Sie die Zahlen für Ihre BWA erhalten.
Wie Sie Ihre BWA analysieren.
Welche Software Sie zum Erstellen einer BWA nutzen.
requirements: Betriebswirtschaftliches Grundwissen
courses.description:
In diesem Videokurs zeige ich Ihnen Schritt für Schritt, wie Sie Ihre betriebswirtschaftliche Auswertung (BWA) nicht nur selbst erstellen, sondern auch richtig verstehen und für Ihre Ziele nutzen können. Ob Sie die BWA für die Bank, das Finanzamt, einen Kredit zur Finanzierung, einen Gründungszuschuss oder Ihre eigene Buchhaltung benötigen – dieser Kurs liefert Ihnen das nötige Know-how und praxisnahe Vorlagen, um Ihre Zahlen sicher im Griff zu haben.
Sie erhalten eine klare, konkrete Anleitung, was zu tun ist – ganz ohne Fachchinesisch, sondern verständlich erklärt. Ich zeige Ihnen anhand echter Beispiele und Videoeinblicke direkt aus meiner Arbeit als Unternehmer, wie Sie mit Excel und anderen Tools eine aussagekräftige und nachvollziehbare BWA aufbauen – Monat für Monat, ohne lange nach Zahlen zu suchen oder komplizierte Formeln zu schreiben.
Außerdem profitieren Sie von Muster-Vorlagen, die Sie direkt übernehmen oder an Ihr Geschäftsmodell anpassen können. Ich vergleiche verschiedene Softwarelösungen, gebe Expertentipps und warne Sie vor typischen Fehlern, die in der Praxis viel Geld oder Vertrauen kosten können.
Dieser Kurs richtet sich an Gründer, Selbstständige, Freiberufler und kleine Unternehmen – kurz: an alle, die endlich verstehen wollen, was ihre BWA wirklich aussagt. Holen Sie sich die Kontrolle über Ihre Zahlen zurück – für mehr Klarheit, bessere Entscheidungen und stärkere Verhandlungspositionen gegenüber Banken, Investoren und Partnern.
target_audience: Existenzgründer, die ihre eigene BWA verstehen wollen.
Studenten, die zur betriebswirtschaftlichen Auswertung schreiben müssen.
Unternehmer, welche ihre eigene betriebswirtschaftliche Auswertung analysieren wollen.
Freelancer und Freiberufler, die ihre eigene BWA verstehen wollen.
Selbständige im Allgemeinen.
Kleinunternehmer, die auch eine BWA benötigen.
Geschäftsführer und Manager

courses.title: TallyPrime Full Course in Hindi – GST, TDS and Payroll
courses.bio: Complete Tally Prime Training to manage Accounting, Inventory, Sales & Purchase Orders, GST, Taxation and Payroll
objectives: How to Create, Alter, Shut and Delete Company in Tally
Accounting basics like debits and credits that will help you understand and post entries with confidence
Learn to transfer account information (Bookkeeping) from physical to TallyPrime Software
Learn to create and alter ledger in TallyPrime
Voucher Entry – Learn to do voucher entry and checking Balance sheet and Profit and Loss Account on that basis
Bank Reconciliation with Company Accounts
Stock and Inventory Management in TallyPrime
Learn how Sales Bill (Invoice) is generated in TallyPrime in POS (Point of Sales)
Learn Bill of Materials (BOM) - a centralized source of information used to manufacture a product.
Learn the procedure of TDS and TCS in general and implementing it in Tally.
GST in TallyPrime - Learn about advanced GST topics like GST Taxation, Reverse Charge Mechanism, GST on Services, GST on Fixed Assets Mutiple GST rates etc
Learn Cost Center and Cost Categories and Budget to Manage Company Expense
Payroll in TallyPrime - Learn complete Corporate Payroll set up that complies with Govt. prescribed deduction rates

TallyPrime Training: Sales Order, Delivery Note, Rejection In, Sales & Credit Note in TallyPrime
Multiple GST Rate In Single Invoice In TallyPrime
GST on Fixed Assets and Recording Input Tax Credit in TallyPrime
The Ultimate GST Handbook: Navigating Goods and Services Tax in India
Master Guide to GST Registration, Filing, and E-Invoicing - Handbook
Tax Deducted at Source (TDS) in TallyPrime
Tax Collected at Source (TCS) in TallyPrime
Cost Centre and Cost Category in TallyPrime
Payroll in TallyPrime (Managing Attendance, Pay-heads, Overtime, Payslip etc )
Income Tax in India: Concepts, Computation & Deductions
Practical Guide to ITR Filing & Income Tax Compliance in India
Complete Guide to TDS & TCS Compliance and Filing Procedures

requirements: Basic Computer Knowledge
courses.description:
TallyPrime with GST, TDS, Payroll & Excel Financial Tools – Complete Course
Master TallyPrime from scratch with real-world accounting practices, complete GST coverage, and bonus Excel financial tools — all in just 5 hours!
Course Overview:
This comprehensive TallyPrime course is designed for anyone who wants to build strong accounting skills using India’s most popular business accounting software — TallyPrime. Whether you're a student, entrepreneur, accountant, or job-seeker, this hands-on course covers everything from company creation to advanced GST, TDS, payroll, and income tax filings.
And that’s not all — you’ll also get a bonus module on Excel's financial functions and What-If analysis to elevate your financial planning and decision-making.


What You’ll Learn:
TallyPrime Basics to Advanced:
Installing TallyPrime & Company Setup
Ledger & Voucher Creation
Bank Reconciliation & Inventory Management
Purchase & Sales Cycle: Orders, Notes, Bills
GST Invoicing, Returns, and Input Tax Credit
Reverse Charge, TDS, TCS, POS & BOM
Cost Centers, Budgets, Payroll, Income Tax & ITR
Union Budget 2025 Tax Updates
Excel Financial Tools (Bonus Section):
Goal Seek for financial target setting
Scenario Manager for planning business cases
EMI calculation using PMT function
Data Tables for sensitivity analysis
Course Features:
5 Hours of Expert Video Lectures
40 Action-Packed Lectures
Real-Life Accounting Use Cases
Bonus Excel Financial Modeling Tools
Lifetime Access + Certificate of Completion


Become Job-Ready and handle real business scenarios with confidence using TallyPrime and Excel tools trusted across India.
Join Now and start mastering India’s top accounting software + Excel financial tools — All in one course!
target_audience: Anyone wants to learn Tally

courses.title: 簿記3級とセットで学びたい 経理1年目の教科書｜やさしい実務入門
courses.bio: ひとりよがりな帳簿はもう卒業！簿記3級の知識を「使えるスキル」へ！試験と実務のギャップを埋める、現場の判断力を養う講座
objectives: 簿記と経理実務の違いを理解し、「今自分がしている作業」が全体のどこにあるのかを把握できるようになる
曖昧な取引を「誰が見てもわかる帳簿」にするためのルール化・見える化の方法を理解できる
会計ソフトや自動仕訳ツールに任せきりにせず、自分の目でチェックし、正しい記録かどうか判断できるようになる
税理士や経営者に信頼される帳簿作成のために、「毎回同じ処理をする」実務上の工夫を実践できるようになる

第０章：はじめに - コースの全体像と学習を成功させるためのガイド: ようこそ！経理1年目のための実践講座へ
本講座であなたが得られる4つのこと
このコースは、こんなあなたのための講座です
講師紹介：経理のコジマです
【特典A】勘定科目ジャッジメントシート
コースの全体像（全5章のロードマップ）
第1章：簿記一巡と経理実務の全体像: 自分の作業の「立ち位置」を知ろう
経理の全体像「簿記一巡」の4ステップ
【役割分担】経理初心者がまず担当すること
すべての基本！経理の「日常業務」一覧
経理の目的は、取引を「見える化」すること
第２章：簿記と実務の違い: 試験対策と現場の仕事の違いを知ろう
簿記試験と実務の一番の違い
簿記試験には必要だけど、実務で使わないもの
“実務に役立つ判断力”と“コミュニケーション力”
経理の不安ってどこからくるの？
「経理の不安」と向き合う（税務署への問い合わせ）
第3章:はじめての経理実務: 実務をのぞいてみよう！
経理の最初の一歩は“領収書”から
領収書から読み取る３つの経理的視点
領収書は「すぐ保管・すぐ分類」
実務でよく使う勘定科目はこの10コ！
第4章 “迷わない経理”になるための 実務判断のコツ: 誰もがつまづく実務判断のコツを予習しましょう
判断に迷うのは「現場あるある」
交際費or福利厚生費 ？実務で迷うパターンを判断してみよう！
クレジット払いは「いつ」仕訳する？
現金過不足、どう処理する？
第5章:帳簿はデータベース: ひとりよがりな会計帳簿を卒業しましょう
帳簿は「未来の情報資産」
会計ソフトの力を100%引き出す、大原則　「一貫性」を守ろう
比較できる帳簿が「気づき」と「判断力」を生む！
検索性UPのための「3つの統一ルール」
「前回どうしたっけ？」にすぐ答えられる帳簿へ！
最終章：コース修了試験と最後のメッセージ: 【最終腕試し】総合確認テスト
【特典B】コピペで使える税務署への問い合わせフレーズ集（PDFダウンロード）
ご受講ありがとうございました！

requirements: 簿記３級を補完する内容ですが、前提知識は不要です。
courses.description:
(本コースにはAIの使用が含まれています)
◆「わかる」が「使える」に変わる！経理1年目のための実践講座◆
「簿記3級は取ったのに、いざ実務となると手が止まってしまう…」 「この取引、どの勘定科目で処理すればいいんだろう？」
そんなあなたのためのコースです。
簿記の資格勉強で学ぶ知識と、日々の現場で求められるスキルとの間には、思った以上に大きなギャップがあります。この「ギャップ」こそが、あなたの不安や自信のなさの正体です。
このコースでは、15年以上の実務経験を持つ講師が、その「ギャップ」を埋めるための“生きた”ノウハウだけを厳選して解説します。教科書に載っている知識を、現場で本当に使える「判断力」に変えるための、具体的な思考法とテクニックを学びます。
▼このコースで、あなたはこうなります
目の前の取引に、もう一人で悩むことはありません。
「なぜこの処理をするのか」を自分の言葉で説明できるようになります。
ひとりよがりな会計帳簿を卒業し、誰からも支持される会計帳簿を作成できるようになります。
▼コースの主な内容
【全体像の把握】 簿記一巡と経理業務全体のつながり
【実務の思考法】 なぜ、資格の知識だけでは不安なのか？
【日常業務のコツ】 多くの新人がつまずく請求・支払・経費精算のポイント
【判断力の養成】 “迷わない経理”になるための現場の判断軸
【未来への視点】 帳簿を“会社のデータベース”として活用する考え方
【特典A】 迷ったときに頼れる「勘定科目ジャッジメントシート」付き！
【特典B】 コピペで使える！税務署への問い合わせフレーズ集！
▼こんな方におすすめです
簿記の学習はしたけれど、実務経験に不安がある方
新人経理として働き始めたばかりの方
自己流の経理に限界を感じている小規模事業者・フリーランスの方
後輩に「なぜこうするの？」と聞かれて、自信を持って答えたい方
さあ、キラリと光る経理センスを身に付けていきましょう！！
target_audience: 経理部に配属されたばかりの新入社員の方 個人事業主・フリーランスとして帳簿管理が必要な方 簿記3級を取得したけれど、実務経験がない方
ベテラン経理で、後輩に指導するときの指針が欲しい方

courses.title: Şirket Kuruluşu Vergi Dairesi, Oda, SGK, Belediye İşlemleri
courses.bio: Örneklerle Gerçek Kişi Ve Şirket Kuruluşu Vergi Dairesi, Esnaf ve Ticaret Odası, Belediye SGK İşlemleri
objectives: Defter Türlerine göre Ticaret Sicili, Vergi Dairesi ve Sgk açılış işlemlerini öğreneceksiniz.
Defter Türlerine göre Vergi Dairesi açılış ve İnteraktif vergi dairesi işlemlerini öğreneceksiniz.
Defter Türlerine göre SGK açılış ve dilekçe işlemlerini öğreneceksiniz.
Defter Türlerine göre Ticaret Sicili açılış ve dilekçe işlemlerini öğreneceksiniz.

Defter Türlerine Göre İşyeri ve SGK açıl: Defter Türlerine Göre İşyeri Açılışı Vergi, SGK, Belediye ve Oda Tanıtım Videosu
Gerçek Kişilerde Vergi Dairesi ve Esnaf: Gerçek Kişi İşyeri Açılışta İstenen Belgeler, Dikkat Edilmesi Gerekenler
Gerçek Kişi İnteraktif Vergi Dairesi ile İşe Başlama Bildirimi Gönderimi
Gerçek Kişilerde Vergi Dairesi Açılışı Sonrası Yapılması Gereken İşlemleri
Gerçek Kişilerde Esnaf Odası Kayıt İşlemleri
Tüzel Kişi Ticaret Odası, Vergi Dairesi: Tüzel Kişi Ticaret Odası Açılış Evrakları ve Dikkat Edilecekler
Tüzel Kişi Şirket Açılışı Mersis İşlemleri Örneği
Tüzel Kişi Şirket Açılış Sonrası Yapılması Gerekenler Vergi Dairesi İşlemleri
Gerçek ve Tüzel Kişilerde Belediye Ruhsa: Gerçek ve Tüzel Kişilerde Belediye Ruhsatı İşlemleri ve Yapılması Gerekenler
Gerçek ve Tüzel Kişilerde Sgk İşyeri Tes: Gerçek ve Tüzel Kişilerde Sgk İşyeri Tescil İşlemleri ve Sgk Şifresi Alma

requirements: Temel muhasebe bilgisi gereklidir.
courses.description: Defter türlerine göre işyeri açılış vergi dairesi, SGK, esnaf odası, ticaret odası ve belediye işlemlerinin nasıl yapılacağını uygulamalı örnekler ve kaynaklardan indirebileceğiniz evraklar ile işlediğimiz kursumuza hoş geldiniz. Kursumuzun toplam 11 dersten oluşmaktadır. Toplam süresi 5 saat 10 dakikadır. Sırasıyla içerikten bahsedecek olursam, ilk derste kurs içeriği tanıtım videosu bulunmaktadır. Kurs içeriği ile ilgili müfredat üzerinden bilgi sahibi olmanız için hazırlanmıştır. İkinci dersimiz de genel olarak defter mükellefiyet türlerin bahsederek bilgi sahibi oluyoruz. Üçüncü dersimiz de gerçek kişiler için işyeri açılışında dikkat edilmesi gerekenlerden ve hazırlanması gereken evraklardan, kaynaklardan indirebileceğiniz form ile anlatım yaparak hazırlık yapıyoruz. Dördüncü dersimizde uygulamalı örnek ile gerçek kişi işyeri açılış işlemini yapıyoruz. Beşinci dersimiz de gerçek kişi işyeri açılışı sonrası yapılması gerekenleri yine form yardımı ile uygulamalı örnekler ile yapıyoruz. Altıncı dersimiz de esnaf odası kayıt işlemlerini, kaynaklardan indirebileceğiniz evrak listesi ile işleyerek bilgi sahibi oluyoruz. Yedinci dersimizde tüzel kişi şirket kuruluşunda dikkat edilmesi gerekenleri ve hazırlanması gereken evrakları, aynalardan indirebileceğiniz belgeler ile işliyoruz. Sekizinci dersimiz de mersis sistemi üzerinden örnek uygulama ile şirket kuruluşu işlemlerini yapıyoruz. Dokuzuncu dersimiz de şirket kuruluşu sonrası yapılacak işlemleri uygulamalı olarak anlatıyoruz. Onuncu dersimiz de belediye ruhsat işlemlerini, indirebileceğiniz evrak listesi ile inceliyoruz. On birinci ve son dersimiz SGK işyeri tescil işlemlerini uygulamalı örnek ve indirilebilir evraklar üzerinden yaparak kursumuzu tamamlıyoruz. Faydalı olması dileğiyle, başarılar dilerim. muhasebeozelonlineegitim@gmail.com
target_audience: Muhasebe bürosu ile ilgili kişiler
İşyeri kuruluşunu öğrenmek isteyenler

- Fazer distribuição de lucro.

courses.bio: Domina Provisiones, Amortizaciones y Casos Reales con Apoyo de IA
objectives: Comprender los principios medios/avanzados de contabilidad.
Aplicar los conocimientos adquiridos a nivel profesional trabajando en departamentos contables.
Gestionar la contabilidad contabilidad completa de una empresa
Realizar análisis patrimoniales enfocados en la toma de decisiones financieras
requirements: Debes poder usar un PC a nivel básico
Hojas de Cálculo tipo Excel a nivel básico
Contabilidad a nivel medio
courses.description:
Este curso es la continuación directa de “Contabilidad Financiera para todos I”. Si ya comprendes los fundamentos contables, ahora es el momento de avanzar hacia operaciones más complejas, aplicadas al entorno real de las empresas.
A lo largo de este nivel intermedio, aprenderás a contabilizar provisiones, periodificaciones, deterioros de valor, amortizaciones con distintos métodos, operaciones con efectos comerciales, entre otros temas clave. Todo ello mediante una metodología práctica, clara y orientada a la toma de decisiones reales.
Además, incorporaremos el uso de herramientas de inteligencia artificial aplicadas a la contabilidad, para optimizar análisis financieros, interpretar datos con mayor rapidez y apoyar la planificación contable con criterio técnico. Verás cómo la IA puede convertirse en un aliado en tus tareas contables cotidianas.
Trabajaremos con situaciones que simulan la realidad empresarial, lo que no solo te permitirá registrar correctamente los asientos, sino también interpretar con mayor profundidad los estados financieros, fortalecer tu criterio contable y planificar con mayor solidez.
¿Qué encontrarás en este curso?
Casos contables reales explicados paso a paso.
Resolución de errores frecuentes en el registro contable.
Integración de la normativa vigente con su aplicación práctica.
Aplicación de inteligencia artificial al análisis contable.
Plantillas descargables, esquemas visuales y ejercicios con solución.
Evaluaciones con retroalimentación para afianzar el aprendizaje.
Acceso de por vida, actualizaciones gratuitas y certificado al completar el curso.
Este curso está dirigido a estudiantes, profesionales, opositores o personas que ya han cursado el nivel básico y desean afianzar su dominio contable con una metodología clara, directa, amable y, sobre todo, orientada a la práctica, a los datos y a las necesidades reales del día a día.
target_audience: Estudiantes de contabilidad
Personal de departamentos administrativos y contables
Personal administrativo y contable que desee sus conocimientos contables
Personas quieran gestionar la contabilidad completa de una empresa

courses.title: Apprendre QuickBooks Desktop de A à Z ( 2025 )
courses.bio: Maitriser vous-même toutes les notions de QuickBooks pour rénover votre vie professionnelle
objectives: Naviguer et identifier tout sur l'écran QuickBooks Desktop
Saisisser et enregistrer tous les types de transactions nécessaires à chaque entreprise dans QuickBooks
Utiliser et personnaliser les rapports les plus importantes de QuickBooks
Créer des fichiers de compagnies dans QuickBooks Desktop
Définir des valeurs par défaut et des paramètres dans la fenêtre Préférences
Comment configurer et gérer le plan comptable
Saisisser et gérer les entités : clients, fournisseurs, employés et autres noms
Saisisser et gérer les listes dans QuickBooks, inclut la charte des comptes
Installer et configurer QuickBooks dans toutes ses intégralités
Gérer les stocks de marchandises avec quiétude

Introduction et Configuration de base: Introduction / choix du logiciel QuickBooks partie 1
Introduction / choix du logiciel QuickBooks partie 2
Création de fichier compagnie (EasyStep Interview) Partie 2
Paramètres comptables et structure de l': Montage d'une charte des comptes Partie 1
Montage d'une charte des comptes Partie 2
Définition des éléments de préférences de l'entreprise
Configuration des taxes sur chiffre d'affaire
Groupement des taxes sur chiffre d'affaire
Gestion des ventes et des clients: Grand livre auxiliaire des clients / compte client
Gestion des achats et des ournisseurs: Grand livre auxiliaire des fournisseurs/Compte fournisseurs
Gestion de l'inventaire / Stocks: Enregistrement des articcles en stock partie 2
Ajustement des quantités et Rapport de stock

requirements: Un minimum de connaissance en comptabilité, en gestion, économie, entrepreneuriat ou autres disciplines connexes.
Un minimum de connaissance en ordinateur (Connaissance de base)
courses.description:
Dans cours de QuickBooks Desktop, vous apprendrez tout ce que vous devez savoir sur QuickBooks Desktop. Découvrez toutes les versions de QuickBooks Desktop : QuickBooks Pro, Premier et Enterprise Solutions. Ce cours vous permettra de passer du niveau débutant à expert en un laps de temps et en toute simplicité, quelle que soit l'année d'installation de votre logiciel QuickBooks. Chaque version annuelle de QuickBooks Desktop est identique en termes d'apparence et de fonctionnement. Ce cours vous permettra d'acquérir les compétences nécessaires pour travailler avec toutes les versions et toutes les années.


Des instructions claires et détaillées vous guideront pas à pas dans l'utilisation de QuickBooks Desktop. Nous effectuerons ensemble la configuration complète et établirons les listes, y compris le plan comptable. Vous découvrirez ensuite tous les types de transactions courants pouvant être saisis dans QuickBooks. Vous apprendrez à personnaliser et à gérer les rapports les plus importants. Vous serez capable de détecter et de corriger les erreurs de saisie de données. Les transactions que nous abordons sont celles dont toute entreprise standard a besoin pour utiliser QuickBooks : factures, reçus de vente, paiements clients, acomptes, virements, saisie de factures et autres transactions similaires.


Cette formation de QuickBooks inclut même la petite caisse et d'autres transactions liées aux remises en argent. Je dispense régulièrement des conseils et astuces QuickBooks pour aider les étudiants à maîtriser parfaitement leur QuickBooks. Les fonctionnalités essentielles de QuickBooks Desktop vous permettront de devenir un expert rapidement, facilement et de manière ludique !
target_audience: Des professionnels qui veulent apprendre et maitriser QuickBooks dans toute son intégralité pour une meilleure utilisation au travail.

courses.title: Aprenda ECF - Escrituração Contábil Fiscal do zero
courses.bio: ECF 2020 - Conheça a Escrituração Contábil Fiscal
objectives: A preparar, validar e transmitir a ECF - Escrituração Contábil Fiscal

Entendendo a ECF - Escrituração Contábil: 2 Obrigação da Entrega e o que Entregar
6 Orientações Práticas e Exemplo no Validador
Entendendo na Prática a ECF: Lucro Real na Prática na ECF - parte 1
Lucro Real na Prática na ECF - parte 2
Lucro Presumido na Prática na ECF

requirements: Não há - mas terá mais proveito se for da area de ciências contábeis, estudante, profissional ou mesmo professor
courses.description: Neste curso o aluno vai aprender do zero a fazer uma ECF Escrituração Contábil Fiscal de um modo fácil e com qualidade. Vai entender o que está envolvido na preparação e na criação da ECF e antes da entrega saberá o que deverá verificar e validar. Verá na prática exemplos dentro do validador com exemplo de uma empresa Lucro Real e outra Lucro Presumido.
target_audience: Contadores, analistas contábeis, estudantes de contabilidade e professores de ciências contábeis

courses.title: Automação Fiscal com Python e API Integra Contador (SERPRO)
courses.bio: Aprenda a automatizar relatórios fiscais com Python, Excel e a API Integra Contador, mesmo sem saber programar.
objectives: Automatizar a geração de relatórios fiscais usando Python e Excel.
Integrar com a API Integra Contador do Serpro de forma prática.
Otimizar a rotina de escritórios contábeis com tecnologia.
Gerar relatórios fiscais automaticamente sem precisar programar.
requirements: Conhecimento básico em Excel. Ter Python instalado (mostramos como no curso). Acesso a uma planilha com CNPJs e razão social dos clientes. Vontade de automatizar processos contábeis e ganhar tempo!
courses.description:
Descrição do Curso: Automação Fiscal com Python e API Integra Contador
Você trabalha em escritório de contabilidade e está cansado de perder horas acessando portais para baixar relatórios fiscais dos seus clientes?
Este curso foi criado para contadores e profissionais da área contábil que desejam automatizar esse processo, mesmo sem saber programar.
Utilizando o poder da linguagem Python, a praticidade do Excel e a integração oficial com a API Integra Contador (Serpro), você vai aprender como gerar relatórios fiscais de dezenas de empresas com apenas alguns cliques, direto no seu computador.
Você vai aprender a:
Integrar com a API da Receita Federal (Integra Contador)
Automatizar a coleta de relatórios fiscais usando Python e planilhas
Obter documentos e informações fiscais de forma rápida e organizada
Aplicar esse conhecimento no dia a dia do seu escritório contábil
Eliminar tarefas manuais e economizar horas de trabalho mensalmente
Para quem é este curso:
Contadores que buscam modernizar seus processos
Escritórios de contabilidade que atendem diversos CNPJs
Profissionais da área fiscal que querem mais produtividade
Quem nunca programou, mas quer aprender na prática
Qualquer pessoa interessada em automação contábil
O que você precisa:
Conhecimentos básicos de Excel
Um computador com internet
Uma planilha com os dados dos seus clientes (CNPJ e razão social)
Vontade de ganhar tempo e trazer inovação ao seu escritório
Este curso é 100% prático, com exemplos reais e explicações passo a passo. Você não precisa saber programar — vamos te guiar em cada etapa.
Transforme sua rotina contábil com tecnologia. Comece agora!
target_audience: Contadores que desejam automatizar tarefas repetitivas e ganhar tempo. Profissionais de escritórios contábeis que lidam com geração de DARFs, DCTFWeb e relatórios fiscais. Donos de escritório que buscam mais eficiência nos processos internos sem depender de sistemas caros. Quem quer usar Python e Excel de forma prática, mesmo sem experiência em programação. Qualquer profissional da área fiscal ou contábil interessado em modernizar sua rotina

courses.description:
『会計は図形にすればわかる！』会計を図形化するあいざわ式メソッド『簿記入門講座』が、全編アニメーション動画に形を変えてUdemy初登場！


従来よくある簿記講座の受講生から「講師が口頭中心で解説するので意味が腑に落ちない」「資料が静的なペーパーなのでつながりや流れがわかりにくい」「専門用語をある程度知っておかないと付いていけない」などの悩みを耳にしました。そこで、初学者の方にこの上なくわかりやすい入門講座を追求して完成したのが本講座です。


本講座の特長と受講後の姿はこうなります。


◎特長１：仕訳をするための手順を具体的に３ステップで覚えられる！（あいざわ式仕訳３ステップ攻略法）
→結果：手順通りに進めれば誰でも仕訳できるようになる！手順化されるので再現性も抜群で一生物の本物のスキルが身につく。


◎特長２：全編アニメーション動画で制作！
→結果：講義もアニメーションを駆使しているので動き、流れ、つながりを視覚的・直感的に理解できる！だから、とにかくわかりやすい！


◎特長３：初学者が誤解しやすい、躓きやすいポイントを丁寧に解説！
→結果：初学者の方が間違いやすいプラスマイナスの判定方法などを理解できるので、簿記に対する苦手意識を解消できる！


◎特長４：資産・負債・純資産・収益。費用（５要素）の意味、代表的な勘定科目を解説！
→結果：学習目的が簿記・会計の本質を理解することに重点を置いているため、資格受験用学習ではなかなか得られない本質を理解できる。そのため、実務で大いに活かせる！


◎特長５：全編オールカラー１４５ページのPDFカラーテキストが付属（動画講座の映像を取り込み）
→結果：動画を視聴できないときでもPDFを見て反復学習できるので、通勤時間や休憩時間のちょっとした時間でも学習できる！
target_audience: 簿記を初めて学ぶ簿記初学者
簿記を学習したけど挫折したことがある方
簿記資格は取得したけど会計の本質を理解しきれていない方

courses.title: Contabilidad desde cero
courses.bio: Equivalente a Procesos de la actividad comercial
objectives: Aprender contabilidad desde cero.
Entender el ciclo contable desde el principio hasta el final.
Conocer la documentación contable.
Aprender a realizar los asientos de compras.
Aprender a realizar los asientos de ventas.

El Ciclo Contable: El Activo, el Pasivo y el Patrimonio Neto
Aprender a realizar asientos de compras
Aprender a realizar asientos de ventas

requirements: No es necesario tener requisitos previos
courses.description:
En este curso darás los primeros pasos en contabilidad. Tanto si estás cursando el ciclo superior de administración y finanzas (o el ciclo medio, gestión administrativa) como si estás cursando contabilidad en ADE o Turismo, te resultará muy útil. Aprenderás cómo funciona el ciclo contable, cómo se gestiona el patrimonio neto, qué son y cómo funcionan las cuentas de activo, pasivo y patrimonio neto. Conocerás el Plan General Contable y la normativa que lo rodea.
Aprenderás y entenderás a realizar los asientos de compras, así como los asientos de devoluciones, descuentos y rappels. Así como las cuentas implicadas y su función en el balance.
Del mismo modo, aprenderás a realizar los asientos de ventas, así como las devoluciones, descuentos y rappels en estas operaciones.
Aprenderás cuáles son las cuentas de activo, pasivo y patrimonio neto y sabrás ubicarlas en el balance.
Este curso puede resultarte muy útil si estás cursando estudios relacionados con la contabilidad y te una asignatura compleja. Aquí aprenderás de forma sencilla y accesible.
Además si estás comenzando tu incursión el ámbito laboral, como contable, y tienes dudas, podrás despejarlas en este curso
Además he puesto a tu disposición material descargables, como ejercicios con sus soluciones.
Por último, si tienes cualquier duda, estamos a tu disposición para ayudarte.
target_audience: Estudiantes de formación profesional de administración y finanzas.
Estudiantes de ADE que quieran aprender a hacer asientos.
Contables que estén iniciando su actividad profesional y necesiten ayuda.
Personas que quieran aprender contabilidad desde cero.

requirements: AS Level Accounting 9706 Knowledge Required
courses.description:
Paper 3 - Financial accounting (A Level)
3.1.1 Financial statements
Candidates should have an understanding of:
• the need for and purpose of financial statements for specific types of business


3.1.2 Partnerships
Candidates should have an understanding of:
• goodwill and the difference between purchased goodwill and inherent goodwill
• how to prepare partners’ capital and current accounts to record changes required in respect of goodwill and revaluation of assets on:
– a change in the partners’ profit-sharing ratio
– the introduction of a new partner
– the retirement of an existing partner
– the dissolution of a partnership
• how to prepare the partnership appropriation account, statement of profit or loss and statement of financial position including changes in a partnership occurring part-way through an accounting year
• how to prepare a realisation account and a revaluation account


3.1.3 Clubs and societies
Candidates should have an understanding of:
• the distinction between a receipts and payments account and an income and expenditure account
• how to define and calculate the accumulated fund
• how to prepare, from full or incomplete accounting records:
– a receipts and payments account
– accounts for trading and revenue-generating activities
– a subscriptions account
– an income and expenditure account
– a statement of financial position
• how to account for other receipts, including life memberships and donations
• how to make adjustments to financial statements (as detailed in 1.5.1)
• how to evaluate possible sources of finance and methods of fundraising


3.1.4 Manufacturing businesses
Candidates should have an understanding of:
• how to prepare a manufacturing account, to differentiate between direct and indirect expenses and to include factory profit
• how to prepare, for a manufacturing business, a statement of profit or loss and a statement of financial position
• how to account for manufacturing profit and the elimination of unrealised profit from unsold inventory
• the reasons why a business may account for manufacturing profit


3.1.5 Limited companies
Candidates should have an understanding of:
• how to prepare for a limited company in line with the relevant international accounting standards and legal requirements:
– statement of profit or loss
– statement of financial position
– statement of cash flows
– statement of changes in equity
– schedule of non-current assets
Candidates are expected to use their understanding of the financial accounts of partnerships, clubs and societies, manufacturing businesses and limited companies to evaluate relevant information and make informed business decisions.


3.2.1 International Accounting Standards
Candidates should have an understanding of:
• the main provisions of each of the following International Accounting Standards (IAS):
– IAS 1 Presentation of financial statements
– IAS 2 Inventories
– IAS 7 Statement of cash flows
– IAS 8 Accounting policies, changes in accounting estimates and errors
– IAS 10 Events after the reporting period
– IAS 16 Property, plant and equipment
– IAS 36 Impairment of assets
– IAS 37 Provisions, contingent liabilities and contingent assets
– IAS 38 Intangible assets


3.2.2 Ethical considerations
Candidates should have an understanding of:
• the need for an ethical framework in accounting
• the fundamental principles of:
– integrity
– objectivity
– professional competence and due care
– confidentiality
– professional behaviour
• how the ethical behaviour of accountants and auditors impacts the business and other stakeholders
• the social implications of decision-making


3.2.3 Auditing and stewardship of limited companies
Candidates should have an understanding of:
• the role and responsibilities of the auditor
• the differences between an external audit and an internal audit
• the difference between a qualified and unqualified audit report
• stewardship and the role of directors and their responsibilities to shareholders
• the importance of a true and fair view in respect of financial statements
Candidates are expected to use their understanding of ethical considerations and auditing to evaluate relevant information and make informed business decisions


3.3.1 Business acquisition and merger
Candidates should have an understanding of:
• the nature and purpose of the merger of different types of businesses to form a new business entity
• how to prepare journal entries and make entries in the relevant ledger accounts to record the:
– merger of two or more sole trader businesses to form a partnership or a limited company
– merger of a sole trader’s business with an existing partnership to form a new partnership
– acquisition of a sole trader’s business or partnership by a limited company
• how to calculate the value of goodwill on the acquisition of a business by another entity
• how to prepare statements of profit or loss and statements of financial position for the newly formed business entity following the acquisition or merger, for example the limited company acquiring the partnership
• the advantages and disadvantages of the acquisition or merger
Candidates are expected to use their understanding of business acquisition and merger to evaluate relevant information and make informed business decisions


3.4.1 Computerised accounting systems
Candidates should have an understanding of:
• the process of transferring the business accounts to a computerised accounting system
• ways in which the integrity of the accounting data can be ensured during the transfer to a computerised accounting system
Note: Knowledge of specific applications or software is not required.


3.5.1 Analysis and communication of accounting information
Candidates should have an understanding of:
• how to calculate the following ratios:
– working capital cycle (in days)
– net working assets to revenue (sales)
– interest cover
– gearing ratio
– earnings per share
– price/earnings ratio
– dividend per share
– dividend yield
– dividend cover
Note: Candidates must use the formula given in the appendix to section 3. These are the only formulae accepted in candidate responses.
• how to analyse and evaluate the results of the ratios and draw conclusions
• how to make appropriate recommendations to stakeholders on the basis of the analysis undertaken
• the interrelationships between ratios
Candidates are expected to use their understanding of the calculation and evaluation of ratios to make informed business decisions using relevant information


4 Cost and management accounting


4.1.1 Activity based costing
Candidates should have an understanding of:
• the application of activity based costing (ABC)
• the uses and limitations of ABC
• what is meant by a cost driver
• how to use ABC to:
– identify the appropriate cost driver
– apportion and allocate overheads
– calculate the total cost and selling price of a unit
• the effect of different methods of overhead absorption on cost and profit
• how to apply ABC costing techniques to make business decisions and recommendations using supporting data


4.2.1 Standard costing
Candidates should have an understanding of:
• the meaning of a system of standard costing in an organisation
• the advantages and disadvantages of a standard costing system
• how standard costing can be used as an aid to improve the performance of a business
• how to calculate the following variances:
– direct material price and usage
– direct labour rate and efficiency
– fixed overhead expenditure and volume
– fixed overhead capacity and efficiency sub-variances
– sales price and volume
• possible causes of favourable or adverse variances and their relationship to each other
• how to make business decisions and recommendations using supporting data
• the significance of non-financial factors


4.3.1 Budgeting and budgetary control
Candidates should have an understanding of:
• the advantages and disadvantages of a budgetary control system to an organisation
• the advantages and disadvantages of preparing budgets using spreadsheets
• what is meant by a master budget
• how to prepare the following budgets:
– sales
– production
– purchases
– labour
– trade receivables
– trade payables
– cash
– budgeted statement of profit or loss
– budgeted statement of financial position
• the effect of limiting factors on the preparation of budgets
• the benefits of flexible budgeting over fixed budgeting
• how to prepare a flexible budget statement
• possible causes of differences between actual and flexible budgeted data
• how to prepare a statement reconciling the flexible budgeted cost of production with the actual cost of production
• how to prepare a statement reconciling the flexible budgeted profit with the actual profit
• how to make business decisions and recommendations using supporting data
• the behavioural aspects of budgeting, including targets, incentives and motivation
• the significance of non-financial factors


4.4.1 Investment appraisal
Candidates should have an understanding of:
• future net cash inflows and outflows arising from the project
• how to apply the following capital investment appraisal techniques:
– payback
– accounting rate of return (ARR = (average profit / average investment) × 100)
– net present value (NPV)
– internal rate of return (IRR)
• the advantages and disadvantages of these capital investment appraisal techniques
• how to make investment decisions and recommendations using supporting data
• the significance of non-financial factors
Note: Questions on discounted payback will not be set.
Note: Questions involving a residual value of an investment at the end of a project will not be set
target_audience: For A2 Level (A Level) Accounting CAIE Students appearing for Exams in March, June or November

courses.title: Accounts Receivable in SAP S/4HANA Cloud
courses.bio: SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Accounts Receivable
objectives: Nắm vững tích hợp FI với các phân hệ SAP chính như Kế toán Quản trị (CO), Bán hàng và Phân phối (SD), Quản lý vật liệu (MM) và Hoạch định sản xuất (PP).
Hiểu các nguyên tắc và quy trình vận hành cốt lõi trong FI, bao gồm kế toán Tổng hợp (GL), phải thu (AR), phải trả (AP) và Kế toán tài sản cố định.
Hiểu rõ các nguyên tắc và quy trình Kế toán phải thu (AR) trong SAP S/4HANA Cloud.
Quản lý hiệu quả dữ liệu Hồ sơ khách hàng một cách chính xác, đảm bảo tính toàn vẹn của dữ liệu đầu vào cho các quy trình AR.
Nắm vững kỹ năng xử lý thanh toán của khách hàng, ghi nhớ tín dụng và quản lý các mục mở trong SAP S/4HANA Cloud.
Xử lý thành thạo các nghiệp vụ hóa đơn đầu ra, bao gồm hóa đơn nội địa, hóa đơn ngoại tệ và hóa đơn cho khách hàng vãng lai, tuân thủ quy định kế toán.
Nắm kiến thức chuyên sâu về việc xử lý thanh toán từ khách hàng, tạo ghi nhớ tín dụng, quản lý các khoản giảm trừ và thực hiện bút toán điều chỉnh công nợ khác.
Tạo và diễn giải các báo cáo AR tiêu chuẩn, chẳng hạn như bảng cân đối phải thu, báo cáo tuổi nợ và dòng tiền, phục vụ cho mục đích quản lý và ra quyết định.
requirements: Kiến thức cơ bản về kinh doanh và tài chính kế toán.
courses.description:
Khóa học: Accounts Receivable in SAP S/4HANA Cloud: Từ Tổng Quan Đến Chuyên Sâu
SAP S/4HANA Cloud đang trở thành nền tảng quản lý tài chính cốt lõi cho nhiều doanh nghiệp, và việc nắm vững nghiệp vụ Kế toán phải thu (Accounts Receivable - AR) là vô cùng quan trọng. Khóa học này được thiết kế để trang bị cho bạn kiến thức và kỹ năng toàn diện về AR, giúp bạn nâng cao năng lực chuyên môn và mở ra nhiều cơ hội nghề nghiệp.
Tầm quan trọng của SAP:
Toàn cầu: Khách hàng SAP tạo ra 87% tổng giao thương toàn cầu ($46 nghìn tỷ). SAP phục vụ 99/100 công ty lớn nhất, 97/100 công ty xanh nhất thế giới, và 80% khách hàng là doanh nghiệp SMEs.
Tại Việt Nam: Với hơn 20 năm hoạt động (văn phòng tại Hà Nội & TP.HCM), SAP là đối tác của 4/5 công ty lớn nhất VNR500 và hơn 770 khách hàng (80% là SMEs). SAP cung cấp hơn 26 giải pháp chuyên ngành thông qua hơn 39 đối tác tại Việt Nam.
Khóa học này cung cấp cho người học lộ trình chi tiết để làm chủ phân hệ Accounts Receivable trong SAP S/4HANA Cloud, từ các khái niệm tổng quan về SAP đến các quy trình nghiệp vụ chuyên sâu về AR. Khóa học kết hợp giữa lý thuyết và thực hành, giúp học viên tự tin áp dụng kiến thức vào thực tế công việc.
Khóa học này phù hợp với các đối tượng sau:
Người mới bắt đầu với SAP: Những người chưa có kinh nghiệm SAP, cần kiến thức cơ bản về S/4HANA và quy trình FI để làm việc hiệu quả.
Sinh viên tài chính/kế toán: Sinh viên muốn hiểu ứng dụng thực tế của SAP S/4HANA trong doanh nghiệp và nâng cao năng lực cạnh tranh.
Chuyên viên tài chính chuyển đổi: Chuyên viên kế toán/tài chính muốn chuyển sang dùng SAP S/4HANA, cần làm quen nhanh với hệ thống và các tính năng nâng cao.
Lãnh đạo doanh nghiệp: CEO, CFO và quản lý muốn hiểu cách S/4HANA hỗ trợ quản lý tài chính và ra quyết định kinh doanh.
Khóa học này nằm trong chuỗi các khóa học về SAP Financial Accounting của One Connect, bao gồm:
SF01: Kế toán phải thu - AR (Accounts Receivable in SAP S/4HANA Cloud)
SF02: Kế toán phải trả - AP (Accounts Payable in SAP S/4HANA Cloud)
SF03: Kế toán tài sản - AA (Asset Accounting in SAP S/4HANA Cloud)
SF04: Kế toán tổng hợp - GL (General Ledger in SAP S/4HANA Cloud )
Nội dung khóa học SF01 -  Kế toán phải thu (Accounts Receivable - AR) bao gồm các phần chính:
Phần 1: Tổng quan về SAP
Chào mừng đến với Thế giới SAP!
ERP là gì? Tổng quan cho người mới bắt đầu
Sức mạnh và Tầm ảnh hưởng của SAP trên toàn cầu
SAP là gì? Tại sao SAP lại quan trọng?
Các giải pháp SAP ECC và SAP Business ByDesign
SAP S/4HANA: Thế hệ ERP thông minh tiếp theo
Làm quen với SAP Fiori: Giao diện người dùng hiện đại
SAP Business Suite và sức mạnh của Trí tuệ Nhân tạo (AI)
Tổng kết và các bước tiếp theo
Phần 2: Tổng quan về kế toán phải thu (Account Receivable - AR)
AR Overview
Phần 3: Quản lý dữ liệu khách hàng
Maintaining Business Partner - Customer Master Records
Creating a Customer Master Record
Creating an Employee
Changing/ Displaying a Customer Master Record
Displaying Customer List
Phần 4: Xử lý hóa đơn và thanh toán - Managing Accounts Receivable Transactions
Entering Outgoing Invoices
Entering Outgoing Invoices in a Foreign Currency
Entering Outgoing Invoices for One-Time Customer
Entering Customer Direct Credit Memo
Posting with a Reference
Uploading Customer Open Items
Posting Incoming Payments - Standard
Posting a Manual Incoming Payment with Difference: Partial / Residual item
Reset Cleared Items
Phần 5: Báo cáo và phân tích
Viewing Accounts Receivable Overview
Viewing Customer Balances
Viewing Customer Line Item
Viewing Overdue Receivables
Phần 6: Kiểm tra kiến thức
Quiz
Khóa học SF01 phù hợp với nhiều đối tượng học viên, từ người mới bắt đầu đến chuyên gia tài chính và lãnh đạo doanh nghiệp, những người có nhu cầu tìm hiểu và làm việc hiệu quả với phân hệ Accounts Receivable trong SAP S/4HANA Cloud.
target_audience: Sinh viên các ngành công nghệ, kinh tế, các cá nhân muốn tìm hiểu về SAP S/4HANA để nâng cao khả năng cạnh tranh trên thị trường lao động và mở rộng cơ hội nghề nghiệp.
Những người muốn tìm hiểu về SAP S/4HANA từ đầu để có thể tham gia vào các dự án triển khai hoặc sử dụng hệ thống trong công việc.

Lãnh đạo doanh nghiệp muốn tìm hiểu cách S/4HANA vận hành để áp dụng vào chiến lược và quản lý hoạt động doanh nghiệp, bao gồm Giám đốc điều hành (CEO), Giám đốc tài chính (CFO), Giám đốc CNTT (CIO) và các cấp quản lý khác trong doanh nghiệp.
Các chuyên viên kế toán, tài chính đang làm việc tại các doanh nghiệp sử dụng các hệ thống kế toán khác và có nhu cầu chuyển đổi sang sử dụng SAP S/4HANA.
Người mới bắt đầu làm việc với SAP S/4HANA phân hệ Tài chính kế toán.

La formation vidéo sur la comptabilité  analytique et budgétaire sur EBP compta PRO  vous permettra de bien réfléchir sur la mise en place de votre comptabilité budgétaire et analytique dans votre société.


Cette formation vidéo sur la comptabilité analytique et budgétaire est valable également pour les versions EBP compta PRO 2021 à 2024

courses.title: Aprende contabilidad desde cero
courses.bio: Contabilidad financiera
objectives: Conocer la contabilidad financiera

Etapas del proceso contable segunda parte

requirements: No se necesita experiencia previa ya que el curso comienza desde cero
courses.description:
¡Bienvenidos al curso de Contabilidad desde cero! En este curso, aprenderás todo lo que necesitas saber sobre los conceptos básicos de la contabilidad y cómo aplicarlos en tu vida cotidiana. Este curso va dirigido a vosotros estudiantes o freelance que quieren conocer la contabilidad y poder usarla en tu negocio. Como dijo Warren Buffet si no dominas la contabilidad no puedes llevar tu empresa al éxito.
Comenzaremos por entender los elementos fundamentales de la contabilidad, como los activos, pasivos y patrimonio. Aprenderás cómo registrar transacciones y cómo preparar estados financieros básicos. También cubriremos temas como el ciclo contable y el balance general.
Una vez que hayas dominado los conceptos básicos, entraremos en temas más avanzados, como la contabilidad de costos y la contabilidad gerencial. Además, aprenderás a utilizar software de contabilidad populares como holded y Excel para ayudarte a llevar las cuentas de tu negocio.
Este curso está diseñado para ser accesible para todos, sin importar su nivel de experiencia o conocimiento previo en contabilidad. Nuestro objetivo es que salgas de este curso con una comprensión sólida de los conceptos contables y cómo aplicarlos en tu vida personal o profesional. ¡Únete a nosotros en este emocionante viaje de aprendizaje te esperamos!
target_audience: El curso va dirigido a emprendedores, freelance y cualquier persona. en entender los principios contables fundamentales

requirements: Tener conocimientos básicos de contabilidad.
courses.description:
En este curso podrás aprender sobre diversos temas relacionados con la contabilidad.
Comenzaremos con la explicación del concepto de contabilidad, la historia de la contabilidad, la estructura contable, el ciclo contable, el registro de asientos contables desde el asiento de apertura y el asiento de cierre hasta movimientos propios de los ejercicios.
También aprenderán sobre activos y pasivos (corrientes y no corrientes), patrimonio, balances generales (Estado de situación patrimonial y estado de resultados) así como su proceso de elaboración pasando del balance de 8 columnas a los estados propiamente dichos. En todo el proceso iremos realizando chequeos para asegurar que la contabilidad va cerrando.
Además, aprenderás sobre particularidades de la registración, asientos de cierre y apertura, amortizaciones, intereses, ajustes y mucho más.
Veremos en los capítulos finales ejercicios de liquidación del IVA, arqueo de caja y conciliación bancaria.
En todos los casos los ejercicios serán explicados paso a paso como llegar a la solución. También en muchos casos verán que los ejercicios están en pdf para descargar.
Al final de muchos de los capítulos verán que hay cuestionarios para comprobar los conocimientos adquiridos a lo largo del mismo.
En caso de dudas siempre podrán contactarme por el centro de mensajes de Udemy y con mucho gusto los ayudaré y responderé.
target_audience: Alumnos de primer año universitario o que estén finalizando su cursos de liceo o secundaria.

courses.title: Mastering Accountancy - Learn concepts from scratch -SharpUp
courses.bio: Learn Accounting from Scratch with Real-World Examples | Build Strong Accounting Skills for Business and Jobs
objectives: Understand the core principles of accounting, including the accounting cycle, journal entries, and double-entry bookkeeping.
Learn how to prepare and interpret financial statements like the Balance Sheet, Income Statement, and Cash Flow Statement.
Master ledger posting, trial balance preparation, and year-end adjustments with practical examples and guided exercises.
Develop the ability to apply accounting concepts to real-world business scenarios for smarter financial decision-making.

Mastering Accountancy: 2. Types of Accounts with Golden Rules

requirements: No prior accounting knowledge is needed – this course starts from the very basics.
A basic understanding of math (addition, subtraction, percentages) will be helpful.
Access to a notebook or spreadsheet tool (like Excel or Google Sheets) to practice problems.
Just bring a curious mind and willingness to learn—we’ll guide you through every concept step by step.
courses.description:
Do accounting terms like debits, credits, balance sheets, or ledgers confuse you? Whether you're a student, entrepreneur, job seeker, or simply someone curious about the world of finance, this course is your step-by-step guide to mastering accountancy from the ground up.
In this course, you’ll learn how to record transactions, prepare financial statements, understand ledgers, and apply accounting concepts in real-life scenarios. We break down complex topics into simple, practical lessons—no jargon, no shortcuts.


What you'll gain:
Confidence in handling day-to-day accounting tasks
A strong grasp of accounting fundamentals and principles
The ability to read and prepare essential financial statements
Real-world knowledge to apply in business or job roles
This course is ideal for:
Students from non-commerce backgrounds
Business owners managing their own finances
Job seekers wanting to boost their financial skills
Anyone looking to make sense of accounting with clarity

Whether you're starting your commerce journey or enhancing your professional skill set, this course will give you a strong accounting foundation you can build on for life.

courses.description:
This comprehensive course is designed to equip participants with the knowledge and skills necessary to effectively use Sage Accounting Software. Whether you are a small business owner, an accounting professional, or an individual looking to enhance your accounting proficiency, this course will guide you through the essential features and functionalities of Sage. Participants will learn how to manage financial transactions, generate detailed reports, and utilize the software for strategic decision-making.
Course Objectives:
Understand the fundamentals of Sage Accounting Software.
Proficiently navigate the Sage interface and customize it for personal or business use.
Manage accounts receivable and payable efficiently.
Reconcile bank statements and manage cash flow.
Generate and interpret financial reports for informed decision-making.
Ensure compliance with accounting standards and practices.
Key Topics:
Introduction to Sage Accounting: Gain an overview of Sage and its applications, and learn how to install and set up the software for the first time.
Company Information Setup: Learn how to create and configure company profiles, set up fiscal years, chart of accounts, and tax codes, and manage user permissions and security settings.
Daily Transactions and Operations: Discover how to record sales and purchase transactions, manage customer and supplier records, and handle invoices, payments, and receipts.
Bank Reconciliation and Cash Flow Management: Master the process of linking bank accounts, importing bank statements, performing bank reconciliations, and monitoring and managing cash flow.
Financial Reporting and Analysis: Understand how to generate standard financial reports such as income statements and balance sheets, customize reports to meet specific needs, and analyze financial data for business insights.
Advanced Features and Integrations: Explore the use of budgeting and forecasting tools, integrate Sage with other business applications, and utilize advanced modules like inventory management and payroll.
Ensuring Compliance and Best Practices: Learn to apply accounting standards, conduct audits, ensure data integrity, and follow best practices for data backup and security.
Learning Outcomes: Upon completion of this course, participants will be able to:
Confidently use Sage Accounting Software for daily accounting tasks.
Maintain accurate financial records and perform bank reconciliations.
Generate and analyze comprehensive financial reports.
Utilize advanced features for enhanced business management.
Ensure compliance with accounting regulations and standards.
Target Audience:
Small business owners and entrepreneurs.
Accounting and finance professionals.
Bookkeepers and office managers.
Anyone interested in enhancing their accounting software skills.


Course Format:
Interactive online sessions with hands-on exercises.
Real-world case studies and examples.
Access to a dedicated online community for peer support and networking.
Prerequisites:
Basic understanding of accounting principles is recommended.
No prior experience with Sage Accounting Software is required.
Join us to unlock the full potential of Sage Accounting Software and streamline your financial management processes!
target_audience: All Accounting Students are eligible for this course

requirements: Kursus ini dirancang untuk semua tingkat pengalaman, termasuk pemula yang belum memiliki pengetahuan atau pengalaman sebelumnya dalam bidang akuntansi. Materi akan disajikan secara bertahap dan dengan bahasa yang mudah dipahami, sehingga peserta dapat memahami konsep dasar akuntansi dengan baik.
courses.description:
Selamat datang di kursus "Menguasai Siklus Akuntansi & Penyusunan Laporan Keuangan"! Ini bukanlah kursus akuntansi biasa. Saya, Ardya, menghadirkan pendekatan belajar yang revolusioner dengan memanfaatkan animasi yang menarik untuk menjelaskan konsep-konsep kompleks dengan lebih mudah dan menyenangkan.
Mulai dari pengantar hingga tahap penyusunan laporan keuangan, saya menggabungkan penjelasan mendalam dengan animasi yang memikat, membuat proses belajar menjadi lebih interaktif dan menghibur. Anda tidak hanya akan mempelajari dasar-dasar akuntansi dan teknik pencatatan transaksi, tetapi juga akan melihat bagaimana setiap langkah dalam siklus akuntansi diilustrasikan dengan jelas melalui animasi yang memukau.
Kursus ini juga dilengkapi dengan kuis-kuis yang disusun secara terstruktur untuk membantu memperkuat pemahaman Anda terhadap materi. Setelah setiap bagian, Anda akan diuji melalui kuis singkat yang dirancang untuk menguji pemahaman Anda dan memperbaiki konsep yang telah dipelajari.
Selain itu, saya menyediakan file-file JPG terkait materi yang memerlukan dukungan visual tambahan, seperti kertas kerja, penjurnalan dan buku besar. File-file ini memberikan referensi visual yang jelas dan mendukung saat Anda mempelajari konsep-konsep akuntansi, membantu Anda memahami dengan lebih baik.
Saya juga tersedia untuk berdiskusi dan menjawab pertanyaan yang muncul selama kursus. Jadi, jika Anda memiliki pertanyaan atau ingin berbagi pemikiran, saya siap mendengarkan dan membantu Anda mengatasi setiap tantangan yang mungkin Anda hadapi.
Jadi, jangan lewatkan kesempatan untuk belajar akuntansi dengan cara yang baru dan menyenangkan! Bergabunglah dengan saya sekarang untuk memulai petualangan Anda dalam memahami siklus akuntansi secara menyeluruh dengan bantuan animasi yang memukau, kuis yang menantang, dan file-file yang mendukung.
target_audience: Individu yang ingin memahami akuntansi
Analis Keuangan yang ingin mengetahui pembuatan laporan keuangan

courses.title: Contabilidade de Custos: Completo com Teoria e Prática
courses.bio: Conheça os principais conceitos e sua aplicação através exemplos e exercícios práticos
objectives: Os principais conceitos relacionados à Custos
Exemplos de aplicação prática na apuração dos Custos de produtos e serviços
Cálculo do Custeio por Absorção e a diferença com os principais métodos de custeio
Diferença entre os tipos de avaliação de estoque (Preço médio, PEPS e UEPS)
requirements: Não é necessário ter experiência para realizar este curso
courses.description:
A contabilidade de custos é conhecimento fundamental para se fazer uma eficiente gestão financeira de uma empresa industrial, comercial ou de serviços. A análise mais apurada da rentabilidade do negócio passa pelo efetivo gerenciamento dos custos e seus impactos. Este curso propicia o entendimento dos principais conceitos relativos à gestão de custos e traz exemplos e exercícios para o domínio dos assuntos apresentados.
O objetivo deste curso é preparar os alunos, a partir de um treinamento dinâmico e completo, trazendo os principais conceitos relacionados à Contabilidade de Custos. Além das vídeos das aulas o aluno tem acesso ao material da aula em PDF com todo o conteúdo ministrado no curso. Ao final de cada seção o aluno testa o conhecimento adquirido através de exercícios de fixação e ainda conta com exercícios de provas anteriores do exame de Suficiência do CFC. Ao completar o treinamento o aluno receberá certificado de conclusão do curso.
O curso está distribuído em 8 módulos e cada módulo é composto pela aula com a teoria e exemplos práticos e outra aula com os exercícios de fixação resolvidos:
Módulo 0 – Apresentação do Curso
Módulo 1 – Introdução à Contabilidade de Custos
Módulos 2 e 3 – Terminologia de Custos
Módulo 4 e 5 – Métodos de Custeio
Módulo 6 – Contabilização de Custos
Módulo 7 – Critérios para Avaliação de Estoque
Módulo 8 – Custo Padrão
target_audience: Estudantes, empreendedores e profissionais que desejam conhecer os principais conceitos relacionados à Contabilidade de Custos, bem como sua aplicação prática.

courses.description:
８時間で「財務・会計」を得意科目へ。

フリーキャッシュフローのが示すもの
正味現在価値の求め方
CAPMの使い方...
なんとなくは分かるけど、表面的な理解にとどまってしまっている。
本番解くために本質的な理解を深めたい。


そんな方に受けてほしい講座です。

本コースは、中小企業診断士試験の「財務・会計」科目のうち、
特に多くの受験生が苦手とする会計分野に注力して徹底的に解説しています。

簿記の知識をベースにした財務分野については、すでにYouTubeなどで良質な講座が多く存在しているため、
独学と組み合わせての学習が効率的です。

「正味キャッシュフロー」「フリーキャッシュフロー」「営業キャッシュフロー」
それぞれ違いが説明できるでしょうか？
このコースでは、多くの受験生がつまずくポイントを厳選して、図解や具体的な数字を使いながら丁寧に解説。
「なぜこの処理になるのか」「どう考えれば選択肢を切れるのか」を、理論と実務の両面からアプローチした、基礎から応用まで網羅できるコースとなっています。
1レクチャーは 20分前後 。
→ 通勤・通学などスキマ時間で無理なく学習可能。


コースは25コース 約8時間
毎日2コース程度を受講するペースであれば2週間で完走できます。
毎日30分の学習でも、16日で完走できます。（2倍速再生ならもっと短期間も可能）
また、過去問をベースに出題パターンと頻出論点を分析し、
「どこが出るのか？」「どう問われるのか？」を意識した構成になっています。
財務・会計を得点源に変える。
「なんとなくの理解」から「確実な得点」へ。
本コースで学び、合格を引き寄せましょう。
target_audience: 中小企業診断士一次試験を受験する方。
中小企業診断士の財務・会計を得意科目にしたい方
財務・会計において理解できない単元がある方。
短期間でなんとしても合格点を獲得したい方

courses.bio: Venha aprender contabilidade
objectives: Aprender um pouco mais de contabilidade em geral
Aprender sobre o Balanço Patrimonial
Compreender melhor as Demonstrações contábeis
Compreender melhor como funciona o dia a dia da contabilidade
entender as terminologias contábeis
requirements: Não é preciso ser contador para fazer o curso. Voltado para todos em geral.
courses.description:
Este curso destina-se a qualquer um que deseje saber um pouco mais sobre a contabilidade e suas ferramentas. Não é necessário qualquer conhecimento sobre o assunto pois o curso é exatamente voltado àqueles que desejam do zero se iniciar no assunto.
Domine todos os processos financeiros com o curso de Ciências Contábeis da Estácio. Aqui, você aprende sobre o controle de receitas, despesas e lucros de uma organização.
A contabilidade está entre as dez profissões que mais contratam no país. Dados do Instituto de Pesquisa Econômica Aplicada (Ipea) revelam que 93,87% dos profissionais dessa área estão empregados.
O curso tem 13 capítulos conforme abaixo:
1 – introdução
2 – o patrimônio
3 – origens e aplicações
4 – técnicas contábeis
5 – teoria das contas
6 – Despesas e receitas receitas
7 – Apuração do resultado
8 – Fato e ato administrativo
9 – Operações com mercadorias
10 – Depreciação, amortização, exaustão
11 – Demonstrações contábeis
12 – Princípios Contábeis
Este curso está de acordo com os princípios contábeis geralmente aceitos, o Comitê de Pronunciamentos Contábeis bem como em conformidade com a harmonização contábil nacional e internacional.
Não é mencionado no curso sobre análise das demonstrações nem tributação, pois o curso é voltado para aqueles que precisam entender melhor e inicialmente o que é a contabilidade e como ela funciona.
target_audience: Este curso destina-se a qualquer um que queira saber como a contabilidade funciona

* A TOTVS é a maior empresa de tecnologia do Brasil, possui mais de 40 mil clientes em 12 setores da economia, do micro e pequeno negócio até as grandes companhias. (50% de market share no Brasil e 32% em toda a América Latina)

courses.title: Buchhaltung - Crashkurs für Selbständige
courses.bio: Grundlagen Buchführung, Kleinunternehmerregel, Betriebsausgaben, Kassenbuchführung u. vieles mehr anschaulich erklärt
objectives: Grundlagen der Buchhaltung
Einnahmen und Ausgaben korrekt in der Buchhaltung erfassen
Einnahmen-Überschussrechnung und Bilanzierung Grundlagen
Kleinunternehmerregelung
Rechnungen erstellen
Kassenbuch führen
Pflichten gegenüber dem Finanzamt
relevante Steuerarten

Einnahmen und Ausgaben: Erträge und Einnahmen / Darlehen und Zinsen
Grundlagen Steuern: Steuererklärungen und Vorauszahlungen an das Finanzamt

requirements: Es sind keine Vorkenntnisse notwendig.
courses.description:
Hallo und herzlich Willkommen zu Deinem Onlinekurs Buchhaltung - Crashkurs für Selbständige.
Der Kurs vermittelt mit Bezug zur Praxis die wichtigsten Grundlagen der Buchhaltung.
Du wirst am Ende des Kurses zum Beispiel eine ordnungsgemäße Rechnung erstellen, Reisekostenabrechnungen aufstellen oder ein korrektes Fahrtenbuch führen können. Außerdem wirst du wissen welche Möglichkeiten es gibt eine Kasse zu führen und welche Anforderungen dabei zu erfüllen sind. Darüber hinaus wirst du die Absetzbarkeit von Betriebsausgaben mit dem gelernten steuerlichen Hintergrund Wissen beurteilen können, sowie diese auf den richtigen Konten verbuchen können. Außerdem werden die Grundlagen der Kleinunternehmerregelung, Einnahme-Überschuss-Rechnung und Bilanz erklärt.
Der Kurs enthält alle relevanten Neuerungen aufgrund des Bürokratieentlastungsgesetzes, Jahressteuergesetz 2024 und Wachstumschancengesetzes ab dem Jahr 2025. Dir steht also das aktuellste Wissen zur Verfügung.


Inklusive Kursskript:
Zum Onlinekurs Buchhaltung- Crashkurs für Selbständige bekommst du zusätzlich ein Kursskript als PDF mit allen Lektionen zum Wiederholen und Üben, für ein schnelles Nachschlagen von Themen sowie der Möglichkeit während des Bearbeitens des Kurses mitlesen und Notizen machen zu können.


Inhalte:
Der Kurs ist in 4 Abschnitte unterteilt und beinhaltet insgesamt 25 Lektionen.


Im ersten Abschnitt lernst du die gesetzlichen Grundlagen und Funktionen der Buchhaltung kennen.


Im zweiten Abschnitt geht es um die Kassenbuchführung, aktuelle Anforderungen an eine Kasse und Tipps zur Vermeidung häufig gemachter Fehler in der Kasse.


Im dritten Abschnitt werden Einnahmen und Ausgaben sowie die entsprechenden Buchungssätze in der Buchführung behandelt.
Im vierten Abschnitt werden wichtige steuerliche Grundlagen vermittelt.


Für wen ist der Kurs geeignet:


Du bist Existenzgründer oder bist bereits selbständig und möchtest dir das notwendige know how aneignen um deine Buchhaltung selber zu erstellen oder kompetent mit dem Steuerberater oder Buchhaltungsbüro zusammen zu arbeiten.
Du absolvierst eine kaufmännische Ausbildung oder bist Schüler einer wirtschaftsbezogenen Fachrichtung und möchtest dir ein besseres Verständnis des Rechnungswesens und Buchhaltung aneignen.
Du arbeitest im kaufmännischen Bereich und willst die Grundlagen der Buchführung erlernen um effektiv mit Buchhaltungsabteilungen und Steuerberatern zusammen zu arbeiten.
Kursstil:


Die Inhalte werden anhand anschaulicher und verständlicher Visualisierungen vermittelt.
Der Fokus des Kurses liegt auf der Erläuterung, häufig in der unternehmerischen Tätigkeit vorkommender Themen. Diese werden praxisnah an Beispielen und mit den dazugehörigen Buchungssätzen erklärt.
Das Gelernte kannst du nach jedem Abschnitt mit einem Quiz überprüfen. Außerdem stehen dir in den Kursmaterialien nützliche Vorlagen und Checklisten zur Verfügung.
Sollten während der Bearbeitung des Kurses Fragen aufkommen beantworte ich diese jederzeit sehr gerne.
Und jetzt wünsche ich dir ganz viel Freude und Erfolg mit deinem Buchhaltungskurs.




Hinweis: Die Informationen und rechtlichen Hinweise dienen der Vermittlung von Wissen und ersetzen keine steuerliche Beratung.
target_audience: Existenzgründer und Selbständige, Angestellte die sich die Grundlagen der Buchhaltung aneignen möchten.
Studenten, Berufsschüler oder Schüler wirtschaftsbezogener Schulen die Grundlagen der Buchhaltung erlernen möchten.

objectives: Learn how to maximize Microsoft office and how much you can enjoy it.
